import axios from'axios';const API='http://localhost:5000/api';// Fetch all stores
export const getStores=async token=>{const res=await axios.get(`${API}/stores`,{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});return res.data;};// Submit a new rating
export const submitRating=async(storeId,rating,token)=>{const res=await axios.post(`${API}/ratings`,{storeId,rating},{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});return res.data;};// Update existing rating
export const updateRating=async(storeId,rating,token)=>{const res=await axios.put(`${API}/ratings/${storeId}`,{rating},{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});return res.data;};
